mapper.select: select l.lid as lid ,l.lname as lname ,u.uname as tname ,u.email as temail ,l.teacher_id as tid ,l.price as price ,l.description as description ,l.subject as subject ,l.entry as entry ,l.startdate as startdate ,l.timesession as timesession ,l.imgpath as imgpath from lecture l inner join user u on l.teacher_id = u.uid where l.lid = #{lid}

select lid , lname , teacher_id , price , description , subject , entry , startdate , timesession , confirm , imgpath from lecture where confirm=true AND startdate BETWEEN CURDATE() AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY) order by startdate
